name: Liberty Universe
description:
Liberty Universe is an open world adventure game, that can be played in singleplayer or multiplayer mode. There are many big maps with dozens of vehicles like cars, boats, helicopters, aircrafts, spaceships and many more. You can also play PvP with a big selection of weapons and attachments.

In Liberty Universe you can nearly do anything you like and have fun!


Features:

  • Singleplayer & Multiplayer mode
  • Many Maps (City, Island, Western City)
  • Many Weapons (Rifles, Pistols, Shotguns, Snipers)
  • Many Vehicles (Cars, Tanks, Motorcycles, Aircrafts, Helicopters, Boats, Submarines, Spaceships, Drones, Blimps)
  • Many Minigames (Racing, Soccer, Zombie Waves)
  • Switch First Person or Third Person view
  • Player movement (Walk, Run, Crouch, Jump, Swim, Lean, Climb)
  • Minimap
  • Enemy & Friend AI

Please report bugs and suggest new features. In future there will come many new maps, vehicles and weapons.

Hompage: https://liberty-universe.eu5.org
